title: SALE of graded, raw, HOFers, SLers, tough backs, etc
author: Pete Pyro

posts.post_title: SALE of graded, raw, HOFers, SLers, tough backs, etc
posts.post_content:
I am selling the following cards here for a short period and keeping what doesnt sell right away. Apologies for photo versus scan. Scanner crapped out. Any questions please ask. Also, I will be making 3 posts so please hold replies until finished. Paypal only. 

$40 Peaches Graham - Piedmont 350 fac 25 - SGC 40 
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/anegu8ag.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/a2ume6yn.jpg[/IMG]

$55 Jimmy Phelan - Sovereign 350 - PSA 3
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/y5ybu6ev.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/e8umatej.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/ebebanan.jpg[/IMG]

$75 Red Ames (hands at chest) - Piedmont 150 fac 25 - PSA 3
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/zy3ete8u.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/y7era6uz.jpg[/IMG]

Post 1 of 3

Raw HOFers - many of my raw cards are cracked PSA/SGC because I was going to collect a full set of raw t206

$100 SOLDChief Bender (no trees) - Sweet Caporal 350 fac 30 - cracked PSA 3.5
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/ugyrarug.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/y5y5ypa7.jpg[/IMG]

$65 Vic Wllis (Pittsburg portrait) - Piedmont 150 - beautiful front. Paper loss back 
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/mebusy3e.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/uqu9u5a9.jpg[/IMG]

$60 SOLDRoger Bresnahan (portrait) - Piedmont 350 fac 25 creased
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/hu5esu8u.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.tapatalk.com/d/14/06/11/utynu5ub.jpg[/IMG]

All raw cards come with plastic sleeve and hard holder. Last grouping for now. Prices are mostly firm and lowball offers are likely to cease negotiations altogether. Best wishes. Thanks for looking. Probably going to shut down sale in 48 hours. 

Pete

BEST LOOKING CARD I HAVE:
$200 SOLDCarlton Molesworth - Old Mill SL (closest I have ever seen to brown back but I suspect they are all just "less black") never been graded and looks nicer than PSA 5s I have cracked. Will kick myself if this really ends up being brown back. Such a stunning card.

Thats all for now. First come, first serve. May be wiggle room, may not depending on how much I like the card. You know how it is. Will message paypal addy to buyers. Thanks again!
Typo on EPDG Demmitt price. Was supposed to be $50. Will honor price listed of $30.
Molesworth, Burns, Konetchy SOLD pending payment. How do I edit posts from mobile to note as sold once payment is confirmed?

Disregard my email as card has been taken; thanks.

Doug
Pm sent on Bender and Bresnahan
Durham, Rossman, Bresnahan, and Bender sold pending payment

Payments received and cards updated as sold. 

Pete
One bump for last 24 hours of sale. Some great cards left!

Sale closed, cards shipped, tracking numbers pm'ed. Happy Hunting! 

Pete
